45.eng-name: Lost Things Picked up by Someone (Luqatah)

hadiths.text: Narrated Ibn `Umar:Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) said, "An animal should not be milked without the permission of its owner. Does any of you like that somebody comes to his store and breaks his container and takes away his food? The udders of the animals are the stores of their owners where their provision is kept, so nobody should milk the animals of somebody else, without the permission of its owner

chapter.ara-name: باب لاَ تُحْتَلَبُ مَاشِيَةُ أَحَدٍ بِغَيْرِ إِذْنٍهِ
chapter.eng-name: No animal may be milked without the permission of its owner
